description: Let's be honest, we all don't know good old Buffalo, NY as much as we think we do. That's exactly why Buffalo Facts is here to get all of your Buffalo facts at your request.
exampleInteractions: Alexa open Buffalo Facts and give me a fact
Ask Buffalo Facts to give me some information
Ask Buffalo Facts for a Buffalo fact
name: Buffalo Facts
shortDescription: Buffalo Facts is an Alexa skill about, what else, Buffalo, NY.
